section.title: Human Face Metadata
section.para: Human Face Metadata section specifies Client ability to retrieve metadata streaming with included Human Face Metadata.

section.title: Feature Level Requirement:
section.para: Check Condition based on Device Features: [TODO: to add DTT feature for HumanFaceMetadata].

section.title: Expected Scenarios Under Test:

listitem.para: Client connects to Device to retrieve metadata streaming with included MetadataStream /VideoAnalyticsStream/Frame/Object/ Appearance/HumanFace element.

Client is considered as supporting Human Face Metadata if the following conditions are met:
Client is able to retrieve metadata streaming with included MetadataStream /VideoAnalyticsStream/Frame/Object/ Appearance/HumanFace element.

Client is considered as NOT supporting Human Face Metadata if ANY of the following is TRUE:
Client is NOT able to retrieve metadata streaming with included MetadataStream /VideoAnalyticsStream/Frame/Object/ Appearance/HumanFace element.

section.para: NOTE: Test Operator shall mark corresponding checkbox on the Onvif Client Test Tool UI in case a client supports this feature.
